mapper.sql: t_house_user_community_status.id , t_house_user_community_status.community_id AS communityId, t_house_user_community_status.tenant_id AS tenantId, t_house_user_community_status.user_id AS userId
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_user_community_status.* FROM t_house_user_community_status WHERE t_house_user_community_status.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_user_community_status.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_user_community_status
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_user_community_status.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_user_community_status.community_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.communityId},'%')
AND t_house_user_community_status.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_user_community_status.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_user_community_status.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_house_user_community_status SET community_id=#{entity.communityId} WHERE user_id=#{entity.userId}
